backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining restaurants, menu items, orders, user profiles, seeded data, and authorization mixin setup.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that rewrites specific South Indian menu item image URLs while preserving other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three frontend image‑handling features, their file impacts, test IDs, and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files, including components, hooks, pages, and styling utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variables defining color tokens and dark mode overrides for the app’s UI.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, authentication handling, layout, and profile‑setup gating.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart state with add/remove/update operations and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart item structures used in the UI.
Provides a button that handles Internet Identity login and logout, updating React Query cache accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content and shows a login prompt card when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/common/ImageWith: Renders an image with automatic fallback handling if the source fails to load.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Exports common UI components for loading skeletons, error messages, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with header navigation, cart badge, auth button, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Displays a dialog for new users to enter and save their name using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and update the authenticated user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderDetail.ts: Contains hooks to fetch order status and items for a given order ID from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Defines a hook to list orders for the current user, currently returning an empty list placeholder.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceOrder.ts: Provides a mutation hook to place an order and invalidate order-related queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurant.ts: Exposes hooks to fetch restaurant details and menu data by restaurant ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurants.ts: Offers a hook to list all restaurants using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theming variables, and a global background image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Implements the shopping cart page with item management and order placement logic.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed order status and items with refresh and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersListPage.tsx: Shows a list of the user's orders with navigation to order details.
Renders restaurant details and menu items with add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantsListPage.t: Lists available restaurants with navigation to their detail pages.
frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts: Provides fallback image mappings and name normalization for dishes and restaurants.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Snapshot of project metadata including architecture notes, known issues, image requirements, and generated asset information.
